Articles.Content:
So. I realized that basically everyone has flown Jeb. Now I have this idea. What if every Jebediah Kerman that we all fly was the SAME INDIVIDUAL? How many missions would he have flown?

What's Jeb done in your save file? I'll add it to the MISSION LIST section, and update the TOTAL MISSIONS and MISSIONS BY OBJECT sections. Oh by the way my Jeb's missions aren't included. I have long forgotten the last time I used Jeb for something.

THE COLLECTIVE JEBEDIAH KERMAN LOG

name = Jebediah Kerman

type = Crew

brave = 0.5

dumb = 0.5

badS = True

MISSION LIST:

_________________________________

MISSIONS BY OBJECT:

KERBIN SOI: 0

KERBIN ATMO/SURFACE: 502

MUN SOI: 0

MUN SURFACE: 201

MINMUS SOI: 1

MINMUS ATMO/SURFACE: 86

KERBOL SOI: 0

KERBOL ATMO/SURFACE: 0

MOHO SOI: 0

MOHO SURFACE: 0

EVE SOI: 0

EVE ATMO/SURFACE: 0

GILLY SOI: 0

GILLY SURFACE: 0

DUNA SOI: 0

DUNA ATMO/SURFACE: 1

IKE SOI: 0

IKE SURFACE: 0

JOOL SOI: 1

JOOL ATMO/SURFACE: 0

LAYTHE SOI: 0

LAYTHE ATMO/SURFACE: 1

VALL SURFACE: 0

TYLO SOI: 0

TYLO SURFACE: 0

BOP SOI: 0

BOP SURFACE: 0

POL SOI: 0

POL SURFACE: 0

EELOO SOI: 0

EELOO SURFACE: 0

INTERSTELLAR: 0

TOTAL MISSIONS: 792

_________________________________

Edited November 6, 2015 by Findthepin1
my jeb has done absolutely nothing! don't even use him!
well um, ive sent Jeb to the mun about 200+ times, laythe once, minmus like 80+ times, and kerbin like 300+ (he lives there obviously)
Since their release I only use female Kerbals. Jeb was long since retired, though he occasionally sneaks on board departing spacecraft in an attempt to relive his glory days.

Got it, adding. I assume all those were landings.

Edited November 5, 2015 by Findthepin1

My Jeb, before he and his wife got eaten by the Kraken, snuck onboard a Minmus orbiting observation station, I guess he liked his honeymoon so much (including multiple landings on Minmus with wife Valentina), he wanted to go back. Valentina looked around KSC for ages. When she found out where he was, she went immediately to join him.

Bob is there now, heading up the mining division.

They both got eaten by the Kraken though. RIP
I don't use Jebediah for anything but testing.

I have flown Jeb 200+ times.

- - - Updated - - -

Also killed him 300+ times...

Jeb and Val is obvious captains of flagship missions, Jeb to Duna, Val to Gilly, Jeb is in selected for the upcoming Jool mission so Val probably take Dress, Not sure if Jeb returns before Eeloo, lots to do in the Jool system

"By your Jebs combined, I am Captain Kerbal!"

Edited November 6, 2015 by Fearless Son

"By your Jebs combined, I am Captain Kerbal!"

Ã¢â„¢Â« Cap-tain Ker-bal, he's our hero...

Gonna bring--- Kraken attacks to zero,

He's our powers, Manleyfied

And he's fighting on the Kerbans' side ! Ã¢â„¢Âª

*Frustrated Eve, Jool and Duna raising their fists in unisson*

All togetter: "You will pay for this Captain Kerbal!"

Gosh, I'm not sure I can really quantify what Jeb has done for me. I landed him on Mun and Minmus many, many times. And I think I've landed him on almost every planet and moon out there, except Jool's "surface" of course.

I often use Jeb as the leader of the most important missions. He was the first to orbit in my space program, first to the Mun and Minmus, first interplanetary manned mission (to Gilly with Bill and Bob), first (along with Bill and Bob) to Duna, and now he's the leader of the 10 kerbal Jool 5 mission on it's way to Jool.
The overused meme of Jeb made me hate him and I never use him. There, I said it. There's no reason to even use a pilot (ever) and when I do use one for the lulz I go with Val or one of the whites.
By the way, you forgot Dres. Everyone who has put Jeb in their Dres space prison or their Dres-teroid miner cannot log their mission on this thread until this is fixed.

Gosh, I'm not sure I can really quantify what Jeb has done for me. I landed him on Mun and Minmus many, many times. And I think I've landed him on almost every planet and moon out there, except Jool's "surface" of course.

My Bob & Bill even tried that once ( not that they had much choice )

I have savefiles back to 2012, I really don't have a clue what my Jeb has done
I'm confused. How does this work. Especially since Jeb has died multiple times. well at least in my saves...
